description: mounted on ivory paper with brown and gold borders; woman reclining on her PL side, wearing a sheer draping garment with a green belt and red and white headscarf; brown background with suggestion of a window in ULC
medium: Oil on fine-grained canvas mounted on paper
provenance: [Claude Apcher, London, until 1973; sold, September 5, for $245, to Moir); Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1973-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Reclining Woman
